text: Allahe ichalamara babe yara buku unmukta karai diche phalata te'om nija pratipalakara taraphara paraa nurara oparata ache, (se'ijana byakti tara darae neki yijana hidayatara oparata na'i?) Eteke durbhoga se'i kathora hrdaya byaktisakalara babe, yisakale allahara smaranara paraa bimukha! Sihamta spasta bibhraantita ache
